name: Number Jump!
description:
Control the ball on a journey to the highest score! Simple, one-touch gameplay gives you full swipe-power over the uphill number frenzy. How far can you make it?

Get the best score and land on the right platforms to keep momentum. Can you land correctly and boost your way to the next level?
